definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Di4 qiu2 Wu4 li3 Xue2 hui4

sentences.english: There exists a tight relationship between the geochemical and geophysical steep zones.
sentences.chinese: 地球化學急變帶與地球物理場變化存在密切關係。

sentences.english: Their findings are reported in the journal Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 《地球物理研究快報》雜誌報道了他們的研究成果。

sentences.english: Tube wave detecting method is a newly developed geophysical detecting method.
sentences.chinese: 管波探測法是新興的地球物理勘查方法。

sentences.english: Geophysics makes the world go round.
The team published their findings in Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 該小組在《地球物理研究快報》上發表他們的發現。

sentences.english: This shows that archaeometry is an important field in geophysical techniques.
sentences.chinese: 顯示了考古是地球物理方法的一個重要應用領域。

sentences.english: The un-uniqueness of estimated parameter is one of the problems in geodetic and geophysical inversion.
sentences.chinese: 解的非惟一性是大地測量地球物理反演的一個難題。

sentences.english: This paper introduces an electrical prospecting based on Winner arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於溫納裝置的地球物理電法探測方法。

sentences.english: Geophysical logging is the basic component of CCSD.
sentences.chinese: 地球物理測井是其重要組成部分。

sentences.english: It falls within the conceptional framework of geophysics.
sentences.chinese: 它在概念體制上隸屬地球物理。

sentences.english: The report was published in the journal Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 這份報告發表在《地球物理研究快報》。
